name: Oosthuizens
description: Oosthuizens Attorneys requested a minimalist site where potential clients can reach them,learn more about their history and the legal services they offer, and also get in touch with them regarding legal advice.

name: Gemma Institute
description:
The GEMMA Institute is a Psychotherapy Clinic based in Frankfurt, Germany. They assist individuals, couples and families experiencing personal and social challenges.

We met their needs by creating a clean & modern website where they can effectively communicate their therapeutic concept and how their therapy works. Custom functionality includes the ability for patients to apply for & complete the relevant consent documentation online, as well as provide feedback for their sessions at the clinic.

name: Varkhart
services: Web Design & Development | Web Application Development
description:
Varkhart started as a small e-commerce store but has since grown to a vast online retail endeavour with a substantial online presence. Originally built upon our custom e-commerce platform, it has since grown to encompass fully-fledged reseller & affiliate programs.

name: SmartFunder
services: Web Design & Development | Web Application Development
description: SmartFunder is a mechanism for Employers in South Africa to assist their employees to pay school fees in a smarter, more tax-efficient way. They wanted a website that reflects their friendly, user-centric brand and provides information regarding their services in a simple, easy-to-understand way. Their main goal was to explain how their business model works and answer any lingering questions.
